snippet.title: A Broken Tale - (in-game footage) We have updated the game engine
snippet.description:
NoLoot Studios is a Norwegian game developer.  A Broken Tale is a commercial game made by a small indie studio in Unity. It is inspired by 90's classics like South Park, Banjo & Kazooie and Conker Bad fur day. It's a original game with custom art, music and graphics. It used to be a RPG Maker project but we wanted to make it something more. Thanks for sticking around, fellas! 

Discord -
https://discord.gg/UMxKKyg 

Twitter -
https://twitter.com/NolootStudios

Facebook -
https://www.facebook.com/NoLoot-Studios-969270770127144/

Patreon - (not acitve yet)

Kickstarer - (Not active yet)

Music - Haakon Davidsen .
https://soundcloud.com/haakond



Subscribe for content created by NoLoot Studios.
